publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1177 Mr Jamie McGrigor: National Gallery of Modern Art-That the Parliament congratulates the National Gallery of Modern Art for its exhibition of the first ever museum showing of Lucian Freud's complete etchings; recognises that this exhibition provides the public with the opportunity to view a unique collection of works of an outstanding artist, and applauds the gallery for bringing forward exhibitions of this calibre that can only enhance the reputation of Scotland in the field of visual arts.
S2M-1177 National Gallery of Modern Art (lodged on 19 April 2004) Murdo Fraser*
S2M-1177 National Gallery of Modern Art (lodged on 19 April 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*, Colin Fox*

S2M-1177 Mr Jamie McGrigor: National Gallery of Modern Art-That the Parliament congratulates the National Gallery of Modern Art for its exhibition of the first ever museum showing of Lucian Freud's complete etchings; recognises that this exhibition provides the public with the opportunity to view a unique collection of works of an outstanding artist, and applauds the gallery for bringing forward exhibitions of this calibre that can only enhance the reputation of Scotland in the field of visual arts. Supported by: Murdo Fraser, Mr Brian Monteith, Colin Fox
S2M-1177 National Gallery of Modern Art (lodged on 19 April 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1177 National Gallery of Modern Art (lodged on 19 April 2004) Alasdair Morgan*
